page.title: 20BUSES 2/TRAINS/ HEALTH
page.content:
Almost anywhere.The bus from Padstow to Newquay along the coastal route also goes through our area.Fares cost Â£1.50 single and Â£1.95 return.Four Private coach companies also serve the area with trips to Plymouth.Columbus Travel run a fortnightly service, 6 hours in Plymouth costing Â£1.75 adult and Â£1.25 child.There are also summer excursions to Clovelly,St Ives Falmouth and Penzance.{TRAINS:}The nearest rail station is Newquay. {DOCTORS AND DENTISTS}The nearest surgeries are in Newquay or St Columb.{MEALS ON WHEELS}Mrs Sterling from Mawgan Porth organises the service for this area.
TEXT TYPED IN by JOHN BUTTIVANT, DALE KENWORTHY,JAMIE PHILLIPS, JAMES BROWN,JOANNE ASHMAN AND ANN-MARIE SAUNDERS.
